channel.title: CVE Feed for Winwar Media -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Winwar Media -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28421|2024-08-02T12:38:25.293Z -- winwar%20media -- wordpress%20email%20marketing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20email%20capture
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Winwar Media WordPress Email Marketing Plugin – WP Email Capture.This issue affects WordPress Email Marketing Plugin – WP Email Capture: from n/a through 3.10.

item.title: CVE-2023-23724|2024-08-02T10:42:25.555Z -- winwar%20media -- wp%20email%20capture
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Winwar Media WP Email Capture plugin <= 3.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-24005|2024-08-02T10:49:08.949Z -- winwar%20media -- inline%20tweet%20sharer%20%E2%80%93%20twitter%20sharing%20plugin
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Winwar Media Inline Tweet Sharer – Twitter Sharing Plugin plugin <= 2.5.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23722|2024-08-02T10:42:26.597Z -- winwar%20media -- wp%20ebay%20product%20feeds
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Winwar Media WP eBay Product Feeds plugin <= 3.3.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23723|2024-08-02T10:42:25.566Z -- winwar%20media -- wp%20email%20capture
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Winwar Media WP Email Capture plugin <= 3.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23728|2024-08-02T10:42:26.257Z -- winwar%20media -- wp%20flipclock
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Winwar Media WP Flipclock plugin <= 1.7.4 versions.
